visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly temperature data. Custom colors should be used for the series. Additional configurations include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray. The title and axis labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The x-axis represents months, and the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius. The data series includes monthly temperature data, and a custom color is applied to the series. Additional configurations include setting the chart margins and enabling the legend with specific alignment and styling.
